query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS materialPriceHistory (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  materialId INT NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  unit VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  supplierName VARCHAR(255),
  notes TEXT,
  recordedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  recordedById INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (materialId) REFERENCES libraryMaterials(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_material_date (materialId, recordedAt)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2v15PjphCS6k4yi.a0fb40a33af2 --database jpou84ZRnGWoiZm2uo5tdU --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS materialPriceHistory (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  materialId INT NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  unit VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  supplierName VARCHAR(255),
  notes TEXT,
  recordedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  recordedById INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (materialId) REFERENCES libraryMaterials(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_material_date (materialId, recordedAt)
);
